description: Use of ground floor dance studio room to rear of shop as pre-school playgroup
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The use permitted shall not operate outside 09.30am  to 2.00pm hours Monday to Friday, and not at any time on Saturdays, Sundays or Bank or Public Holidays.  REASON:	In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties. | There shall be no more than 16 children attending the playgroup at any one time.  REASON:   To ensure that there is no future increase in the size of the nursery in order to protect the living conditions of nearby residents. | The premises shall only be used as a playgroup between the hours of 09.30am and 02.00pm and as a dance studio.  REASON:   A D1 use other than a dance studio or playgroup may give rise to conditions detrimental to neighbouring amenity. | The entrances to the playgroup shall be level prior to first use as a playgroup.  REASON:   To ensure that the property is accessible.
